name: Criminal Empire: Mafia Mysteries & Serial Killers

episodes.title: “Twisted Tales: Inside America’s Most Brutal Cults (Compilation Special)”
episodes.description: 🔪 Blind loyalty. Broken minds. Blood-soaked beliefs. In this dark, disturbing compilation, we take you deep into the heart of America’s most terrifying cults — the leaders who promised salvation, and the followers who were dragged into madness. 🧠🔥🕯️ From Jonestown’s final broadcast to Charles Manson’s twisted philosophy, this episode gathers the most chilling segments from past investigations into a single, hard-hitting special. We’ll revisit: The cult that turned a suburban mansion into a suicide shrine The leader who claimed to speak for God — and demanded blood Survivors who escaped and the scars they carry This is a guided descent into manipulation, murder, and mass delusion. If you think you understand cults, think again — these are the stories that kept investigators up at night. 🎙️ Listener discretion advised. This is the dark side of belief.
